short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video volume control with the ability to increase it up to 600 percent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video volume control with the ability to increase it up to 600 percent!

Our advantages:

1. Increases the volume up to 600 percent.
2. Preserves website volume settings and automatically applies them upon revisiting the page.
3. Does not block fullscreen mode for videos.
4. Hotkeys for more convenient control.
